org.codice.ddf.catalog.ui.query.monitor.email

Class EmailNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.catalog.ui.query.monitor.email.EmailNotifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryUpdateSubscriber

    public class EmailNotifier
extends Object
implements QueryUpdateSubscriber
    Sends an email for each workspace to the owner of the workspace.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmailNotifier(String bodyTemplate, String subjectTemplate, String fromEmail, MetacardFormatter metacardFormatter, SubscriptionsPersistentStore subscriptionsPersistentStore, SmtpClient smtpClient)
      The bodyTemplate and subjectTemplate may contain the tags supported by the metacardFormatter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmailNotifier

        public EmailNotifier(String bodyTemplate,
                     String subjectTemplate,
                     String fromEmail,
                     MetacardFormatter metacardFormatter,
                     SubscriptionsPersistentStore subscriptionsPersistentStore,
                     SmtpClient smtpClient)
        The bodyTemplate and subjectTemplate may contain the tags supported by the metacardFormatter.
        Parameters:
        bodyTemplate - A string that represents the email body, will be passed to MetacardFormatter.
        subjectTemplate - A string that represents the subject line of the email, will be passed to MetacardFormatter.
        fromEmail - The 'from' email address to be set in the email.
        metacardFormatter - Used to format the body and subject line.
        subscriptionsPersistentStore - Used to find the email address associated with a workspace id.
        smtpClient - The SmtpClient that will send the email.

    • Method Detail

        The template string used for the email body.

        The template string used for the email subject.

        Parameters:
